研究の料: (けんきゅうのりょう) - research materials
研究グループ: (けんきゅうグループ) - research group
研究チーム: (けんきゅうチーム) - research team
研究休暇: (けんきゅうきゅうか) - sabbatical; sabbatical leave
研究会: (けんきゅうかい) - research society; study class (e.g. religious); seminar (e.g. presentation of research)
研究分担者: (けんきゅうぶんたんしゃ) - member (of a research project)
研究分野: (けんきゅうぶんや) - research area; field of research
研究員: (けんきゅういん) - researcher; lab worker
研究図書館: (けんきゅうとしょかん) - research library
研究報告: (けんきゅうほうこく) - report of (one's) research; research paper
研究報告書: (けんきゅうほうこくしょ) - research report
研究委託契約書: (けんきゅういたくけいやくしょ) - research outsourcing contract
研究室: (けんきゅうしつ) - laboratory; seminar room; professor's office
研究室棟: (けんきゅうしつとう) - laboratory block; research laboratory building
研究対象: (けんきゅうたいしょう) - subject of research
研究対象者: (けんきゅうたいしょうしゃ) - human research subject; person who is being studied
研究展望報告書: (けんきゅうてんぼうほうこくしょ) - state of the art report
研究心: (けんきゅうしん) - spirit of study (inquiry, enquiry); (having) an inquiring mind
研究成果: (けんきゅうせいか) - research results
研究所: (kenkyuusho) - instituição de pesquisa, instituto de pesquisa, laboratório
研究所報: (けんきゅうしょほう) - research institute bulletin
研究教育センター: (けんきゅうきょういくセンター) - research and teaching centre (center)
研究教育拠点: (けんきゅうきょういくきょてん) - center of excellence; COE
研究方法: (けんきゅうほうほう) - research methods; method of study (research)
研究材料: (けんきゅうざいりょう) - research material; experimental material
研究業績: (けんきゅうぎょうせき) - research results; research record; research achievement
研究機関: (けんきゅうきかん) - research institution
研究活動: (けんきゅうかつどう) - research activities
研究熱心: (けんきゅうねっしん) - of inquiring mind; eager to study; enthusiastic in studying
研究発表: (けんきゅうはっぴょう) - research publication; scholarly publication
研究発表会: (けんきゅうはっぴょうかい) - meeting for reading research papers
研究結果: (けんきゅうけっか) - results of a scientific investigation; findings
研究課題: (けんきゅうかだい) - research task
研究調査: (けんきゅうちょうさ) - research investigation; research survey
研究論文: (けんきゅうろんぶん) - research thesis; treatise
研究責任者: (けんきゅうせきにんしゃ) - principal investigator; PI
研究費用: (けんきゅうひよう) - research expenses; research costs
研究資料: (けんきゅうしりょう) - material (data) for one's research; research material
研究部: (けんきゅうぶ) - research division; research club (e.g. at school, university)
研究開発: (けんきゅうかいはつ) - R and D; research and development
研究領域: (けんきゅうりょういき) - area of study (investigation); research area
研究題目: (けんきゅうだいもく) - subject for study (inquiry, enquiry); laboratory subject
研鑚: (けんさん) - diligent study; devoting oneself to one's studies
研鑽: (けんさん) - diligent study; devoting oneself to one's studies
砕けた: (くだけた) - easy (e.g. explanation, description)/plain/familiar; informal (e.g. greeting, expression)/friendly/affable (e.g. person)
砕ける: (くだける) - to break (into pieces)/to be broken/to be smashed; to collapse/to crumble/to decline/to cool (e.g. enthusiasm)/to dampen (e.g. one's will to fight); to become less formal/to throw off reserve/to become affable; to become easy to understand (e.g. a story); to be worried
砕け散る: (くだけちる) - to be smashed up
砕け波: (くだけなみ) - breaker; breaking wave; broken sea
砕る: (はつる) - to shave off (esp. concrete); to take a percentage/to take a cut
砕波: (さいは) - breaker; breaking wave; spilling breaker; surging breaker; wave breaking
砥ぐ: (とぐ) - to sharpen/to hone/to whet/to grind; (esp. 磨ぐ) to wash (rice); to scour/to polish/to burnish
砥糞: (とくそ) - sludge from sharpening a sword, etc. on a grindstone
砥草: (とくさ) - scouring rushes; Equisetum hyemale; common horsetail
砦: (さい) - Forte, forte, fortaleza, reduto, fortificação
砦を築く: (とりでをきずく) - to construct a fort
砦を落とす: (とりでをおとす) - to capture a fort
砧: (ちん) - Bloco de batimento, bloco de madeira ou pedra para bater tecido
砧木: (だいぎ) - stock (in grafting); wood used as a platform (or base, etc.)/block (i.e. chopping block)/(gun) stock/unworked block of wood
砲: (hou) - canhão, arma, canhão, artilharia, equipamento bélico
砲丸: (ほうがん) - shell; shots; cannon ball
砲丸投げ: (ほうがんなげ) - the shot put
砲列: (ほうれつ) - battery (of artillery, cameras, etc.); barrage
砲声: (ほうせい) - sound of a gun; roar of cannon
